verses.verse: Now Korah,<WH7141> the son<WH1121> of Izhar,<WH3324> the son<WH1121> of Kohath,<WH6955> the son<WH1121> of Levi,<WH3878> with Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> the sons<WH1121> of Eliab,<WH446> and On,<WH203> the son<WH1121> of Peleth,<WH6431> sons<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> took men:<WH3947>

and they rose up<WH6965> before<WH6440> Moses,<WH4872> with certain<WH582> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> two hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> princes<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH4150> called<WH7148> to the assembly,<WH5712> men<WH582> of renown;<WH8034>

and they assembled themselves together<WH6950> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to them,<WH7227> "You take too much on yourself,<WH5712> since all the congregation are holy,<WH6918> everyone of them,<WH3068> and Yahweh is among<WH8432> them:<WH5375> why then lift yourselves up above the assembly<WH6951> of Yahweh?<WH3068>"
When Moses<WH4872> heard<WH8085> it,<WH5307> he fell on his face:<WH6440>

and he spoke<WH1696> to Korah<WH7141> and to all his company,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> "In the morning<WH1242> Yahweh<WH3068> will show<WH3045> who are his,<WH6918> and who is holy, and will cause him to come near<WH7126> to him:<WH977> even him whom he shall choose he will cause to come near to him.<WH7126>
Do<WH6213> this:<WH3947> take censers,<WH4289> Korah,<WH7141> and all his company;<WH5712>

and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in them,<WH2004> and put<WH7760> incense<WH7004> on them before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> tomorrow:<WH4279> and it shall be that the man<WH376> whom Yahweh<WH3068> chooses,<WH977> he shall be holy.<WH6918> You have gone too far,<WH7227> you sons<WH1121> of Levi!<WH3878>"
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Korah,<WH7141> "Hear<WH8085> now,<WH1121> you sons of Levi!<WH3878>

Is it a small thing<WH4592> to you,<WH430> that the God of Israel<WH3478> has separated<WH914> you from the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> to bring you near<WH7126> to himself,<WH5647> to do the service<WH5656> of the tabernacle<WH4908> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> to minister to them;<WH8334>
and that he has brought you near,<WH7126> and all your brothers<WH251> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> with you?<WH1245> and do you seek the priesthood also?<WH3550>
Therefore<WH3651> you and all your company<WH5712> are gathered together<WH3259> against Yahweh:<WH3068> and Aaron,<WH175> what is he that you murmur against him?<WH3885>"
Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> to call<WH7121> Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> the sons<WH1121> of Eliab;<WH446> and they said,<WH559> "We won't<WH5927> come up:

is it a small thing<WH4592> that<WH3588> you have brought us up<WH5927> out of a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> to kill<WH4191> us in the wilderness,<WH4057> but you must also<WH8323> make<WH8323> yourself a prince over us?<WH8323>

Moreover<WH637> you haven't<WH935> brought us into a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> nor given<WH5414> us inheritance<WH5159> of fields<WH7704> and vineyards:<WH3754> will you put out<WH5365> the eyes<WH5869> of these men?<WH582> We won't<WH5927> come up."

Moses<WH4872> was very<WH3966> angry,<WH2734> and said<WH559> to Yahweh,<WH3068> "Don't<WH6437> respect their offering:<WH4503> I have not taken<WH5375> one<WH259> donkey<WH2543> from them,<WH7489> neither have I hurt one of them.<WH259>"
Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Korah,<WH7141> "You and all your company<WH5712> go before<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> you,<WH175> and they, and Aaron, tomorrow:<WH4279>

and each man<WH376> take<WH3947> his censer,<WH4289> and put<WH5414> incense<WH7004> on them,<WH376> and each man bring<WH7126> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> his censer,<WH4289> two hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> censers;<WH4289> you also,<WH175> and Aaron, each<WH376> his censer.<WH4289>"

They each<WH376> took<WH3947> his censer,<WH4289> and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> in them,<WH7760> and laid incense<WH7004> thereon,<WH5975> and stood at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting<WH4150> with Moses<WH4872> and Aaron.<WH175>

Korah<WH7141> assembled<WH6950> all the congregation<WH5712> against them to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to all the congregation.<WH5712>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>
"Separate<WH914> yourselves from among<WH8432> this congregation,<WH5712> that I may consume<WH3615> them in a moment!<WH7281>"

They fell<WH5307> on their faces,<WH6440> and said,<WH559> "God,<WH430> the God<WH410> of the spirits<WH7307> of all flesh,<WH1320> shall one<WH259> man<WH376> sin,<WH2398> and will you be angry<WH7107> with all the congregation?<WH5712>"
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Speak<WH1696> to the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> <WH5927> 'Get away from around<WH5439> the tent<WH4908> of Korah,<WH7141> Dathan,<WH1885> and Abiram!<WH48>'"
Moses<WH4872> rose up<WH6965> and went<WH3212> to Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram;<WH48> and the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> followed<WH3212> him.<WH310>

He spoke<WH1696> to the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559> "Depart,<WH5493> please,<WH168> from the tents of these wicked<WH7563> men,<WH582> and touch<WH5060> nothing of theirs,<WH5595> lest you be consumed in all their sins!<WH2403>"

So they went<WH5927> away from the tent<WH4908> of Korah,<WH7141> Dathan,<WH1885> and Abiram,<WH48> on every side:<WH5439> and Dathan<WH1885> and Abiram<WH48> came out,<WH3318> and stood<WH5324> at the door<WH6607> of their tents,<WH168> and their wives,<WH802> and their sons,<WH1121> and their little ones.<WH2945>
Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "Hereby you shall know<WH3045> that Yahweh<WH3068> has sent<WH7971> me to do<WH6213> all these works;<WH4639> for they are not from my own mind.<WH3820>
If these men die<WH4191> the common death<WH4194> of all men,<WH120> or if they be visited<WH6485> after the visitation<WH6486> of all men;<WH120> then Yahweh<WH3068> hasn't<WH7971> sent me.

But if Yahweh<WH3068> make<WH1254> a new thing,<WH1278> and the ground<WH127> open<WH6475> its mouth,<WH6310> and swallow them up,<WH1104> with all that appertain to them,<WH3381> and they go down alive<WH2416> into Sheol;<WH7585> then you shall understand<WH3045> that these men<WH582> have despised<WH5006> Yahweh.<WH3068>"
It happened,<WH3615> as he made an end of speaking<WH1696> all these words,<WH1697> that the ground<WH127> split apart that was under them;<WH1234>

and the earth<WH776> opened<WH6605> its mouth,<WH6310> and swallowed them up,<WH1104> and their households,<WH1004> and all the men<WH120> who appertained to Korah,<WH7141> and all their goods.<WH7399>

So they,<WH3381> and all that appertained to them, went down alive<WH2416> into Sheol:<WH7585> and the earth<WH776> closed<WH3680> on them,<WH6> and they perished from among<WH8432> the assembly.<WH6951>
All Israel<WH3478> that were around<WH5439> them fled<WH5127> at their cry;<WH6963> for they said,<WH559> "Lest the earth<WH776> swallow us up!<WH1104>"
Fire<WH784> came forth<WH3318> from Yahweh,<WH3068> and devoured<WH398> the two hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> who offered<WH7126> the incense.<WH7004>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH559> to Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest,<WH3548> that he take up<WH7311> the censers<WH4289> out<WH996> of the burning,<WH8316> and scatter<WH2219> the fire<WH784> yonder;<WH1973> for they are holy,<WH6942>

even the censers<WH4289> of these sinners<WH2400> against their own lives;<WH5315> and let them be made<WH6213> beaten<WH7555> plates<WH6341> for a covering<WH6826> of the altar:<WH4196> for they offered<WH7126> them before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> therefore they are holy;<WH6942> and they shall be a sign<WH226> to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>"

Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the bronze<WH5178> censers,<WH4289> which those who were burnt<WH8313> had offered;<WH7126> and they beat<WH7554> them out for a covering<WH6826> of the altar,<WH4196>

to be a memorial<WH2146> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to the end that<WH834> no stranger,<WH376> who isn't<WH2233> of the seed of Aaron,<WH175> comes near<WH7126> to burn<WH6999> incense<WH7004> before<WH6440> Yahweh;<WH3068> that he not be as Korah,<WH7141> and as his company:<WH5712> as Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to him by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

But on the next day<WH4283> all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> murmured<WH3885> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559> "You have killed<WH4191> Yahweh<WH3068>'s people!<WH5971>"

It happened,<WH5712> when the congregation was assembled<WH6950> against Moses<WH4872> and against Aaron,<WH175> that they looked<WH6437> toward the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and behold,<WH6051> the cloud covered<WH3680> it,<WH3519> and the glory of Yahweh<WH3068> appeared.<WH7200>
Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came<WH935> to the<WH6440> front of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>
"Get away<WH7426> from among<WH8432> this congregation,<WH5712> that I may consume<WH3615> them in a moment!<WH7281>" They fell<WH5307> on their faces.<WH6440>

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "Take<WH3947> your censer,<WH4289> and put<WH5414> fire<WH784> from off<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> in it,<WH7760> and lay incense<WH7004> on it,<WH3212> and carry it quickly<WH4120> to the congregation,<WH5712> and make atonement<WH3722> for them;<WH7110> for wrath has gone out<WH3318> from Yahweh!<WH3068> The plague<WH5063> has begun.<WH2490>"

Aaron<WH175> did<WH3947> as Moses<WH4872> said,<WH1696> and ran<WH7323> into the midst<WH8432> of the assembly;<WH6951> and behold,<WH5063> the plague has begun<WH2490> among the people:<WH5971> and he put<WH5414> on the incense,<WH7004> and made atonement<WH3722> for the people.<WH5971>
He stood<WH5975> between the dead<WH4191> and the living;<WH2416> and the plague<WH4046> was stayed.<WH6113>
Now those who died<WH4191> by the plague<WH4046> were fourteen<WH702> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred,<WH3967> besides those who died<WH4191> about the matter<WH1697> of Korah.<WH7141>
Aaron<WH175> returned<WH7725> to Moses<WH4872> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting:<WH4150> and the plague<WH4046> was stayed.<WH6113>
